messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] new to the list
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Stella I m Dawn F. (born in England and moved to America at 22)... have two kids, 5 in August and 9 months old.  Just started the unschooling thing and
messages.messageBody:
Hi Stella

I'm Dawn F. (born in England and moved to America at 22)... have two kids, 5
in August and 9 months old. Just started the unschooling thing and still
learning lots and lots from people on this list and also from the
homeschooling group I've joined in Tucson, Arizona, where we currently
live... Yes it's 105 today and we are off to the pool soon... July 4th here
so most people are off work and having bar-b-qs and fireworks tonight. This
year we bought fireworks for November 5th, when I'm going to have a Guy
Fawkes party.... Going to start showing Zak (5yr old) some of the things I
did growing up in England.

Welcome

Dawn F
